text: The platforms Congrés is a station on line 5 of the Barcelona Metro. The station is located underneath Carrer Garcilaso, between Carrer Matanzas and Carrer Francesc Tàrrega Claret. It was opened in 1959. The side-platform station has a ticket hall on either end, each with one access. ==Services== ==External links== * Congrés at Trenscat.com Category:Railway stations opened in 1959
title: Congrés (Barcelona Metro)
